amendment.description: Amendment requires that the net budget authority savings contained in the bill be used for deficit reduction.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to require that the net budget authority savings in the bill be used for deficit reduction. Specifically, the amendment requires that the net budget authority savings in the bill be appropriated to the Deficit Reduction Fund established by executive order, and is to be exclusively used for deficit reduction.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Murtha amendment (A007) Agreed to by recorded vote: 421 - 1 (Roll no. 241).
